metadata.title: An overview of automated room disinfection systems: When to use them and how to choose them

abstract.original_text: At one time, contaminated surfaces were thought to contribute negligibly to endemic transmission of pathogens in hospitals [3, 4] . However, recent data indicate that contaminated surfaces make an important contribution to the endemic transmission of 15
